queries.name: monthly-total-sum
queries.query: SELECT sum(totalAmountCents)/100 FROM `demo.order_invoice` where orderMonth=${ORDER_MONTH} and orderYear=${ORDER_YEAR} and restaurantId=${RESTAURANT_ID} and orderStatus='DELIVERED' LIMIT 1000

queries.name: monthly-order-count
queries.query: SELECT count(*) FROM `demo.order_invoice` where orderMonth=${ORDER_MONTH} and orderYear=${ORDER_YEAR} and restaurantId=${RESTAURANT_ID} and orderStatus='DELIVERED' LIMIT 1000

queries.name: monthly-item-popularity
queries.query: SELECT name, sum(quantity) as itemCount FROM `demo.order_items` where orderMonth=${ORDER_MONTH} and orderYear=${ORDER_YEAR} and restaurantId=${RESTAURANT_ID} and orderStatus='DELIVERED' group by name order by itemCount desc limit 15
